<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the demanded bits for a narrowing MVE intrinsic. The TopOpc is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opcode specifying a Top/Bottom instruction, which can change between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SimplifyNarrowInstrTopBottom =&#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TopOpc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>.getType())-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsTop = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>.getOperand(TopOpc))-&gt;getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only odd/even lanes of operand 0 will only be demanded depending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on whether this is a top/bottom instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> DemandedElts =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8c55d8510ad4b7cb957d8f5a7cd6944e">APInt::getSplat</a>(NumElts, IsTop ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad960e1ff48d25c382b6d28e7961f074e">APInt::getLowBitsSet</a>(2, 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The other lanes will be defined from the inserted elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UndefElts &amp;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8c55d8510ad4b7cb957d8f5a7cd6944e">APInt::getSplat</a>(NumElts, IsTop ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad960e1ff48d25c382b6d28e7961f074e">APInt::getLowBitsSet</a>(2, 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400" lineLink="#a2db21ddc2a6983ec696cd972ad43031e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a2db21ddc2a6983ec696cd972ad43031e">isFPSatMinMaxPattern</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64iseldagtodag-cpp/#a2098a5fa6ada61b6c4a1f210ad84e4a1a4ebada6a2af2bcba53ded1d7b414f081">FP</a> = <a href="#a0deafca5c66f3b900139bcf024085e8f">isSSATMinMaxPattern</a>(Inst, Imm);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Division by a constant can be turned into multiplication, but only if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know it&#39;s constant. So it&#39;s not so much that the immediate is cheap (it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not), but that the alternative is worse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: this is probably unneeded with GlobalISel.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Opcode == Instruction::SDiv || Opcode == Instruction::UDiv ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Leave any gep offsets for the CodeGenPrepare, which will do a better job at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// splitting any large offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::GetElementPtr &amp;&amp; Idx != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::And) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UXTB/UXTH</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm == 255 || Imm == 65535)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conversion to BIC is free, and means we can use ~Imm instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::min(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(~Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Add)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conversion to SUB is free, and means we can use -Imm instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::min(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::ICmp &amp;&amp; Imm.isNegative() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t NegImm = -Imm.getSExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;isThumb2() &amp;&amp; NegImm &lt; 1&lt;&lt;12)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// icmp X, #-C -&gt; adds X, #C</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not it will become a series of function calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CallCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aa9afd54ce2ef21c71a89f9c5d7df6a40">getCallInstrCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Dst, &#123;Src&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a> &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SrcTy.isFixedLengthVector()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Treat a truncate with larger than legal source (128bits for MVE) as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expensive, 2 instructions per lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((SrcTy.getScalarType() == MVT::i8 ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseCost = ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; Src-&gt;isVectorTy()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     ? ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AdjustCost(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BaseCost &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad0c9ac06022884eb218dc8f8c4056e43">BaseT::getCastInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, Src, CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#afd09053fe36fc5a2526341e8fcd2af83"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#afd09053fe36fc5a2526341e8fcd2af83">ARMTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ValTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Penalize inserting into an D-subregister. We end up with a three times</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lower estimated throughput on swift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasSlowLoadDSubregister() &amp;&amp; Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ValTy-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; ValTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() &lt;= 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasNEON() &amp;&amp; (Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cross-class copies are expensive on many microarchitectures,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so assume they are expensive by default.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getElementType()-&gt;isIntegerTy())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even if it&#39;s not a cross class copy, this likely leads to mixing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of NEON and VFP code and should be therefore penalized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValTy-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ValTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() &lt;= 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::max&lt;InstructionCost&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">          2U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; (Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Integer cross-lane moves are more expensive than float, which can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sometimes just be vmovs. Integer involve being passes to GPR registers,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// causing more of a delay.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy-&gt;getScalarType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LT.first &#42; (ValTy-&gt;getScalarType()-&gt;isIntegerTy() ? 4 : 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thumb scalar code size cost for select.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba737cfc93e5a2ff961677d57186167e7c">TTI::TCK&#95;CodeSize</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a78d0f198115bfe3331ab7cfcf7a40a97">ISD::SELECT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Select costs can vary because they:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;VecValTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t have mve.fp any fp operations will need to be scalarized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::FCmp &amp;&amp; !ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One scalaization insert, one scalarization extract and the cost of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VecCondTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are two types - the input that specifies the type of the compare</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the output vXi1 type. Because we don&#39;t know how the output will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split, we may need an expensive shuffle to get two in sync. This has the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiplication.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LT.first &#42; Entry-&gt;Cost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ae3c3eb22dfa7c2b373ac485024f99aa6">BaseT::getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Opcode, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Op1Info, Op2Info);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is somewhat of a hack. The problem that we are facing is that SROA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creates a sequence of shift, and, or instructions to construct values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These sequences are recognized by the ISel and have zero-cost. Not so for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the vectorized code. Because we have support for v2i64 but not i64 those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sequences look particularly beneficial to vectorize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To work around this we increase the cost of v2i64 operations to make them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// seem less beneficial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LT.second == MVT::v2i64 &amp;&amp; Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#ab57fcce122c37b4aaff911cf66b62583">isUniform</a>() &amp;&amp; Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#a1a058bd4bb89596c5f97215d985080a5">isConstant</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this operation is a shift on arm/thumb2, it might well be folded into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the following instruction, hence having a cost of 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LooksLikeAFreeShift = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CxtI || !CxtI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() || !CxtI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac5984d6827f6e6922bed00bf03ba9552">isShift</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#ab57fcce122c37b4aaff911cf66b62583">isUniform</a>() || !Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#a1a058bd4bb89596c5f97215d985080a5">isConstant</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Folded into a ADC/ADD/AND/BIC/CMP/EOR/MVN/ORR/ORN/RSB/SBC/SUB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(CxtI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6609528bd67d5506a9bf9a2cce2d6f58">user&#95;back</a>())-&gt;getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Add:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::And:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Or:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default to cheap (throughput/size of 1 instruction) but adjust throughput</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for &quot;multiple beats&quot; potentially needed by MVE instructions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; Ty-&gt;isVectorTy())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BaseCost = ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The rest of this mostly follows what is done in BaseT::getArithmeticInstrCost,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without treating floats as more expensive that scalars or increasing the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TLI-&gt;isOperationLegalOrCustomOrPromote(ISDOpcode, LT.second))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;VTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Ty)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Ty-&gt;getScalarType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the cost of multiple scalar invocation plus the cost of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#af41ea97386e5b3aab125935caf351bb5"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#af41ea97386e5b3aab125935caf351bb5">ARMTTIImpl::getMemoryOpCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Src,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type legalization can&#39;t handle structs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) == MVT::Other)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasNEON() &amp;&amp; Src-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(Src)-&gt;getElementType()-&gt;isDoubleTy()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unaligned loads/stores are extremely inefficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need 4 uops for vst.1/vld.1 vs 1uop for vldr/vstr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LT.first &#42; 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MVE can optimize a fpext(load(4xhalf)) using an extending integer load.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some smaller than legal interleaved patterns are cheap as we can make</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(DataTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, it is assumed that for the MVE gather instructions the loads are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all effectively serialised. This means the cost is the scalar cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiplied by the number of elements being loaded. This is possibly very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conservative, but even so we still end up vectorising loops because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cost per iteration for many loops is lower than for scalar loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VectorCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElems &#42; LT.first &#42; ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scalarization cost should be a lot higher. We use the number of vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements plus the scalarization overhead. If masking is required then a lot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of little blocks will be needed and potentially a scalarized p0 mask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// greatly increasing the cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElems &#42; LT.first + (VariableMask ? NumElems &#42; 5 : 0) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a5dcb8d597c1066eec7ef713b758f78f4"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a5dcb8d597c1066eec7ef713b758f78f4">ARMTTIImpl::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;ValTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       std::optional&lt;FastMathFlags&gt; FMF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ValVT = TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, ValTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize = ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In general floating point reductions are a series of elementwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations, with free extracts on each step. These are either in-order or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// treewise depending on whether that is allowed by the fast math flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a32ec12017722f5b42a295fe5eb0b0bdf">ISD::FADD</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9ab5860c97a00c4627a08cab7b0c8178">ISD::FMUL</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((EltSize == 32 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVFP2Base()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (EltSize == 64 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFP64()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (EltSize == 16 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFullFP16()))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecLimit = ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VecCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElts) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">           NumElts &#42; EltSize &gt; VecLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts / 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For fp16 we need to extract the upper lane elements. MVE can add a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VREV+FMIN/MAX to perform another vector step instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtractCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp; NumElts == 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtractCost = NumElts / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecCost + ExtractCost +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">           NumElts &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a7415ab9f2172c59a2ee7c7a02afa56a4">ISD::OR</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a92febb83e6ba116eb7aae8e7e3f70cc1">ISD::XOR</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (EltSize == 64 || EltSize == 32 || EltSize == 16 || EltSize == 8)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecLimit =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VecCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElts) &amp;&amp; NumElts &#42; EltSize &gt; VecLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts / 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For i16/i8, MVE will perform a VREV + VORR/VAND/VEOR for the 64bit vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() &lt;= 16 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumElts &#42; EltSize == 64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From here we extract the elements and perform the and/or/xor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtractCost = NumElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecCost + ExtractCost +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (NumElts - 1) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               Opcode, ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() || !ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a19738f4334d4de357b22349bbb56fb5c">isSimple</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aacaa7d017eb34bf5050b2fb7f6dd91c4">BaseT::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, FMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, MVT::v8i16, 1&#125;,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Entry = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e9fc08ad29b9cdcf4d0bc6cf86ebf53">CostTableLookup</a>(CostTblAdd, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a>, LT.second))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a19738f4334d4de357b22349bbb56fb5c">isSimple</a>() &amp;&amp; ResVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a19738f4334d4de357b22349bbb56fb5c">isSimple</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The legal cases are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   VADDV u/s 8/16/32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   VADDLV u/s 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Codegen currently cannot always handle larger than legal vectors very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// well, especially for predicated reductions where the mask needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split, so restrict to 128bit or smaller input types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RevVTSize = ResVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() &lt;= 128 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ((LT.second == MVT::v16i8 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 32) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (LT.second == MVT::v8i16 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 32) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (LT.second == MVT::v4i32 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 64)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; LT.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a4910f3acf596de7348ca70c0b41b0040">BaseT::getExtendedReductionCost</a>(Opcode, IsUnsigned, ResTy, ValTy, FMF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
