<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a4cbc62bcd4117c7767755022e0ef6a8a"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a4cbc62bcd4117c7767755022e0ef6a8a">ARMTTIImpl::getMulAccReductionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsUnsigned, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ResTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;ValTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ValVT = TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, ValTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ResVT = TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, ResTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a19738f4334d4de357b22349bbb56fb5c">isSimple</a>() &amp;&amp; ResVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a19738f4334d4de357b22349bbb56fb5c">isSimple</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The legal cases are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   VMLAV u/s 8/16/32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   VMLALV u/s 16/32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Codegen currently cannot always handle larger than legal vectors very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// well, especially for predicated reductions where the mask needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split, so restrict to 128bit or smaller input types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RevVTSize = ResVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() &lt;= 128 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((LT.second == MVT::v16i8 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 32) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (LT.second == MVT::v8i16 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 64) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (LT.second == MVT::v4i32 &amp;&amp; RevVTSize &lt;= 64)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; LT.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aa3e5ac869df3bf1d37fca48c06228608">BaseT::getMulAccReductionCost</a>(IsUnsigned, ResTy, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a7b2fcbe31b1e7a23ebe5be0c1e70343a"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a7b2fcbe31b1e7a23ebe5be0c1e70343a">ARMTTIImpl::getMinMaxReductionCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fastmathflags">FastMathFlags</a> FMF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ValVT = TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In general floating point reductions are a series of elementwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations, with free extracts on each step. These are either in-order or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// treewise depending on whether that is allowed by the fast math flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((IID == Intrinsic::minnum || IID == Intrinsic::maxnum) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f32 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVFP2Base()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f64 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFP64()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFullFP16()))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Ty)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize = ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecLimit = ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VecCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElts) &amp;&amp; NumElts &#42; EltSize &gt; VecLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(Ty-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts/2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsiccostattributes">IntrinsicCostAttributes</a> ICA(IID, VecTy, &#123;VecTy, VecTy&#125;, FMF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a4ce494fdd302adc3c52bc02868f223c8">getIntrinsicInstrCost</a>(ICA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For fp16 we need to extract the upper lane elements. MVE can add a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VREV+FMIN/MAX to perform another vector step instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtractCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() &amp;&amp; ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumElts == 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VecCost += ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtractCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Ty)-&gt;getNumElements() / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsiccostattributes">IntrinsicCostAttributes</a> ICA(IID, Ty-&gt;getElementType(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                &#123;Ty-&gt;getElementType(), Ty-&gt;getElementType()&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                FMF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecCost + ExtractCost +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (NumElts - 1) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a4ce494fdd302adc3c52bc02868f223c8">getIntrinsicInstrCost</a>(ICA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IID == Intrinsic::smin || IID == Intrinsic::smax ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IID == Intrinsic::umin || IID == Intrinsic::umax) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All costs are the same for u/s min/max.  These lower to vminv, which are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// given a slightly higher cost as they tend to take multiple cycles for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// smaller type sizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab67fb380e11a28280789a20888e59bb3">CostTblEntry</a> CostTblAdd&#91;&#93;&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aaac895215ecbb3c411c957c8beb39b70">ISD::SMIN</a>, MVT::v16i8, 4&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aaac895215ecbb3c411c957c8beb39b70">ISD::SMIN</a>, MVT::v8i16, 3&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aaac895215ecbb3c411c957c8beb39b70">ISD::SMIN</a>, MVT::v4i32, 2&#125;,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This is a workaround for poor cost modelling. Min/Max intrinsics are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not currently canonical, but soon will be. Code without them uses icmp, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so is not tail predicated as per the condition above. In order to get the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same performance we treat min and max the same as an icmp for tailpred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// purposes for the moment (we often rely on non-tailpred and higher VF&#39;s to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pick more optimial instructions like VQDMULH. They need to be recognized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// directly by the vectorizer).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::smin ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2310"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::smax ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2313"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++ICmpCount &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To set up a tail-predicated loop, we need to know the total number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements processed by that loop. Thus, we need to determine the element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size and:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) it should be uniform for all operations in the vector loop, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    e.g. don&#39;t want any widening/narrowing operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) it should be smaller than i64s because we don&#39;t have vector operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    that work on i64s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) we don&#39;t want elements to be reversed or shuffled, to make sure the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    tail-predication masks/predicates the right lanes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347" lineLink="#a786a99e437c617417c56b4b4678138b9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a786a99e437c617417c56b4b4678138b9">canTailPredicateLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2348"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopaccessinfo">LoopAccessInfo</a> &#42;LAI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Tail-predication: checking allowed instructions\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are live-out values, it is probably a reduction. We can predicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// most reduction operations freely under MVE using a combination of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefer-predicated-reduction-select and inloop reductions. We limit this to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// floating point and integer reductions, but don&#39;t check for operators</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specifically here. If the value ends up not being a reduction (and so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectorizer cannot tailfold the loop), we should fall back to standard</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectorization automatically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt; Instruction &#42;, 8 &gt;</a> LiveOuts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LiveOuts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6880d6c7da94499220b6d7dfcc3c88d4">llvm::findDefsUsedOutsideOfLoop</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2567"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On v6m cores, there are very few registers available. We can easily end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spilling and reloading more registers in an unrolled loop. Look at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of LCSSA phis as a rough measure of how many registers will need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be live out of the loop, reducing the default unroll count if more than 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value is needed.  In the long run, all of this should be being learnt by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// machine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#a0623a79f9be44774a206d71ccced388e">UnrollCount</a> = 4;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    L-&gt;getExitBlocks(ExitBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Exit : ExitBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count the number of LCSSA phis. Exclude values coming from GEP&#39;s as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only the last is expected to be needed for address operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveOuts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac214df91cdc242f4710ea5a93939c678">count&#95;if</a>(Exit-&gt;phis(), &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PH) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><span class="doxyHighlight">               !isa&lt;GetElementPtrInst&gt;(PH.getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExitingValues = ExitingValues &lt; LiveOuts ? LiveOuts : ExitingValues;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitingValues)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#a0623a79f9be44774a206d71ccced388e">UnrollCount</a> /= ExitingValues;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#a0623a79f9be44774a206d71ccced388e">UnrollCount</a> &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For processors with low overhead branching (LOB), runtime unrolling the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// innermost loop is often detrimental to performance. In these cases the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remainder gets unrolled into a series of compare-and-jump blocks, which in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deeply nested loops get executed multiple times, negating the benefits of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LOB. This is particularly noticable when the loop trip count of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// innermost loop varies within the outer loop, such as in the case of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// triangular matrix decompositions. In these cases we will prefer to not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unroll the innermost loop, with the intention for it to be executed as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// low overhead loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a273ffd11c1ebf40fc70e3b22009adabdabc366f2d0ba3d681e7a3899917c5d3de">Runtime</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasLOB()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a91ac801aa45c78e0d0edbc36115ef054">hasLoopInvariantBackedgeTakenCount</a>(L)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BETC = SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a22d9bcbd44563106d7217f3bd9a4039e">getBackedgeTakenCount</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Outer = L-&gt;getOutermostLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((L != Outer &amp;&amp; Outer != L-&gt;getParentLoop()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (L != Outer &amp;&amp; BETC &amp;&amp; !SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a5a19768af81df7e5fe571bc08dcd48b3">isLoopInvariant</a>(BETC, Outer))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a273ffd11c1ebf40fc70e3b22009adabdabc366f2d0ba3d681e7a3899917c5d3de">Runtime</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2614"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if Ext1 and Ext2 are extends of the same type, doubling the bitwidth</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690" lineLink="#a34998313b61266257a43201da0dd344c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64targettransforminfo-cpp/#a34998313b61266257a43201da0dd344c">areExtractExts</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ext1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ext2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
